Newbold-on-Avon Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
newbold-on-avon-contest

Recollections of Schubert
Newbold-on-Avon, Warwickshire Hymn Tune 1. Woolaston Colliery 2. Fleckney 3. Long Lawford. Prizes - 1st £8 and cup, 2nd £4, 3rd £2, 4th £1.
Referenced in Wright and Round's Brass Band News - September 1930
Dec. 7, 2018, 5:20 p.m. Dec. 10, 2018, 1:58 p.m.
1 Fleckney Silver Simeon Iliffe
2 Griff Colliery Simeon Iliffe
3 Woolaston Colliery W. Green
4 Nuneaton Borough Charles Albert Anderson
